Name: PSIONIC
About the game: PSIONIC - is an unusual 3D shooter about psychiatric hospital with hardcore elements where you have to survive and get out of this horror. You are the only survived scientist in the secret laboratory. During the unknown experiment all people became animals that want to kill every living creature. They are mad and anxious of blood. One of the purposes is collecting everything on your way – ammos, guns, aid kit etc. But don’t think it will be easy. A majority of different enemies are waiting for you. Kill them or they’ll kill you. Are you strong enough to survive? Make sure right now. GAME FEATURES: · Nice pixel graphics · Unforgettable soundtracks · Dynamic and hardcore gameplay · Various choice of guns from shotguns to sawthrower
